info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 15 at 5:55PM PDT until March 15 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTH CENTRAL CLARK COUNTY... At 555 PM PDT, Thunderstorm activity has decreased across the warned area. However, between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain has fallen and runoff from the earlier storms continues. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Moapa Town, Overton, Moapa Valley and Logandale. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
